quotes.text: Your gift is something that you can do innately better than anything else.
quotes.author: Steve Harvey

quotes.text: Every time we liberate a woman, we liberate a man.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: It is ignorance that causes most mistakes.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.text: Not why the addiction but why the pain.
quotes.author: Gabor Mate

quotes.text: In the middle of chaos lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Your very silence shows you agree.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: When the mind is calm, how quickly, how smoothly, how beautifully you will perceive everything.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: Wherever you are is the entry point.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.text: The best way to understanding is a few good examples.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: If you don't break your ropes while you're alive, do you think ghosts will do it after?
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.text: A wise man makes his own decisions, but an ignorant man mindlessly follows the crowd.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Work for something because it is good, not just because it stands a chance to succeed.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.text: I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Be approximately right rather than exactly wrong.
quotes.author: John Tukey

quotes.text: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: How you think is as important as as what you think.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Problems remain as problems because people are busy defending them rather than finding solutions.
quotes.author: Celestine Chua

quotes.text: There are as many opinions as there are experts.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Maybe you are searching among the branches, for what only appears in the roots.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Man should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Remember we're all in this alone.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: The most efficient way of rendering the poor harmless is to teach them to want to imitate the rich.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.text: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily, even if you had no title or position.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: The ability to hold two competing thoughts in one's mind and still be able to function is the mark of a superior mind.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: It's the little things done consistently over time, straight from your heart, that have the greatest impact.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: He that can have patience can have what he will.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Be still when you have nothing to say; when genuine passion moves you, say what you've got to say, and say it hot.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.text: Only when I fall do I get up again.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.text: If you want to be sad, no one in the world can make you happy. But if you make up your mind to be happy, no one and nothing on earth can take that happiness from you.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Walk towards the sunshine, and the shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Mary Engelbreit

quotes.text: The less you try to impress, the more peaceful you can be.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagace

quotes.text: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: The wise learn many things from their enemies.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.text: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.text: When we allow negative messages to fester in our head, they take on a life of their own.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.text: Fear is your worst enemy. Risk is your best friend.
quotes.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quotes.text: There is no value in anything until it is finished.
quotes.author: Genghis Khan

quotes.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Darkness is the absence of light.
quotes.author: Kamal Ravikant

quotes.text: Enthusiasm makes up for a host of deficiencies.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: What you resist, persists.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Stay away from people who makes you feel like you are wasting their time.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Even if you're sure you can win, be careful that you can live with what you lose.
quotes.author: Gary Keller

quotes.text: Sad thing is, you can still love someone and be wrong for them.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.text: Never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Confidence is the greatest friend.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Any fool can paint a picture, but it takes a wise man to be able to sell it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu
